Real.name: minimum distance
Real.description: the distance below which this sound no longer gets louder

Real.name: maximum distance
Real.description: the distance beyond which this sound is no longer audible

RealFraction.name: skip fraction
RealFraction.description: fraction of requests to play this sound that will be ignored (0 means always play.)

Explanation.name: randomization
Explanation.description: these settings control random variation of volume and pitch. the second parameter gets clipped to the first.

Real.name: gain base
Real.description: sound's random gain will start here

Real.name: gain variance
Real.description: sound's gain will be randomly modulated within this range

ShortBounds.name: random pitch bounds
ShortBounds.description: the sound's pitch will be modulated randomly within this range.

Explanation.name: directional sounds
Explanation.description: these settings allow sounds to be directional, fading as they turn away from the listener

Angle.name: inner cone angle
Angle.description: within the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of 1.0.

Angle.name: outer cone angle
Angle.description: outside the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of OUTER CONE GAIN. (0 means the sound does not attenuate with direction.)

Real.name: outer cone gain
Real.description: the gain to use when the sound is directed away from the listener

Explanation.name: SCRIPTED LOCATION OVERRIDE
Explanation.description: NOTE: this will only apply when the sound is started via script azimuth: 0 => front 90 => left 180 => back 270 => right

Explanation.name: scale modifiers
Explanation.description: as the sound's input scale changes from zero to one, these modifiers move between the two values specified here. the sound will play using the current scale modifier multiplied by the values specified above. (0 values are ignored.)

ShortBounds.name: bend bounds
ShortBounds.description: the range of pitches that will be represented using this sample.

ShortInteger.name: first index of chunk for a language

Explanation.name: parameter description
Explanation.description:
DLS2 filtering: resonance gain range: [0, 22.5] dB
parametric EQ: gain range: [-64, 14] dB
for mono sounds: the left filter controls the DLS 2 parameters the right filter controls the Parametric EQ parameters
for stereo sounds: both left and right channels must have the same filter i.e., filter type both is invalid

StringId.name: reflection type
StringId.description: type which is compared with type in current sound_environment tag

ShortInteger.name: promotion count
ShortInteger.description: when there are this many instances of the sound, promote to the new sound.

Real.name: suppression time
Real.description: time from when first permutation plays to when another sound from an equal or lower promotion can play
